My concern is, according to a recent communication with a local resident, who should not be named, that there is possibly a woman having sexual relationships with the Police Officers insitu. I would very much like confirmation of this, please.

Description of the woman concerned is as follows:

Fair hair
Tomboy short haircut
Short silver skirt
Fishnet stockings

Other wear includes:

Light blue jeans
Crop top with exposed flesh

Very mouthy. Activity may be at back of Gravesend Police Station

No comeback on myself, please, as for general opinion by the public, only.

Disgusting!
